Deities @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Ravithra]{Ravithra}
Domain Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.lXxP1ziyf4ozkpmv]{Split the Tongue}; Advanced Domain Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.CPNlhDQP3aDmLzB3]{Ordained Purpose}
Like the serpentine nagas, you're in tune with cosmic forces that Ravithra once controlled.
name: Naga Domain
